statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, activity_type FROM user_behavior WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE activity_type = 'click' AND ad_content_id = 100;
SELECT user_id, username, activity_timestamp FROM user_behavior WHERE username LIKE 'John%';
SELECT DISTINCT(activity_type) FROM user_behavior WHERE username = 'Alice' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_behavior WHERE username LIKE '%john%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS login_count FROM user_behavior WHERE activity_type = 'login' GROUP BY username HAVING login_count > 2;
SELECT username, ad_content_id FROM user_behavior WHERE ad_content_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY username ASC, ad_content_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM user_behavior WHERE activity_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM AdContent
SELECT ad_title, ad_description FROM AdContent
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, ad_score FROM AdContent ORDER BY ad_score DESC
SELECT ad_id, target_audience FROM AdContent WHERE target_audience = 'Adults'
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, ad_description FROM AdContent WHERE ad_score > 8.5 ORDER BY ad_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdContent WHERE target_audience = 'Families' AND ad_score BETWEEN 7 AND 9;
SELECT ad_title, ad_description, target_audience FROM AdContent WHERE ad_score < 5 ORDER BY ad_title ASC;

SELECT ad_id, ad_title, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM AdContent JOIN UserInteractions ON AdContent.ad_id = UserInteractions.ad_id WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM AdContent JOIN UserInteractions ON AdContent.ad_id = UserInteractions.ad_id WHERE UserInteractions.user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehavior ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AdContent WHERE ad_type = 'Promotional';
SELECT ad_id, ad_description FROM AdContent ORDER BY ad_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM UserBehavior WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, ad_type, ad_description FROM AdContent WHERE ad_type = 'banner';
SELECT user_id, ad_id, interaction_type FROM UserAdInteraction ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM UserAdInteraction GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehavior JOIN UserAdInteraction ON UserBehavior.user_id = UserAdInteraction.user_id WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM user_behavior;
SELECT user_id, activity_type FROM user_behavior ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_category FROM ad_content WHERE ad_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM user_ad_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, impressions FROM ad_performance WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, ad_category FROM ad_content WHERE ad_type = 'video';
SELECT user_id, ad_id, interaction_type FROM user_ad_interaction WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT ad_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id;
SELECT DISTINCT ad_type FROM ad_content ORDER BY ad_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, join_date FROM users;
SELECT email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, click_date FROM ad_clicks ORDER BY click_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action_type, action_date FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT user_id, campaign_id, click_date FROM ad_clicks WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY click_date ASC;
